instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.LCD_PWR_EN: What is LCD_PWR_EN? LCD_PWR_EN is a signal that tells the chip that supplies power to the LCD screen to turn on..

threads.title: MacBook Pro 15" late 2011 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Graphicproblem internal Screen Black
threads.message:
Hey Guys,
got a problem with a MacBook 15".
I have replaced the LCD, but it doesn't work.

External screen works fine, internal screen stays black.

threads.title: MacBook Pro 15" late 2011 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Graphicproblem internal Screen Black
MacBook Pro 15" late 2011 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B Graphicproblem internal Screen Black
threads.message: <SIGNAL>LCD_PWR_EN</SIGNAL> present? Probably not because the GPU will probably be dead. Pin 246 of the GPU sends out the signal responsible to enable the lcd.
